thread.title: MoneyGram to Present at the Deutsche Bank Leveraged Finance Conference
thread.title_full: MoneyGram to Present at the Deutsche Bank Leveraged Finance Conference - Yahoo Finance

author: MoneyGram
title: MoneyGram to Present at the Deutsche Bank Leveraged Finance Conference
text:
DALLAS, Sept. 28, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- MoneyGram ( MGI ), a leading global money transfer and payment services company, today announced that it will present at the Deutsche Bank 2015 Leveraged Finance Conference on Tuesday, September 29, 2015, at The Phoenician in Scottsdale, AZ.
Larry Angelilli, Senior Vice President and Treasurer, will speak at 8:00 a.m. Mountain Standard Time (11:00 a.m. Eastern Time). A live audio webcast of the presentation will be available on the company website in the investor relations section, ir.moneygram.com .
About MoneyGram International, Inc.
MoneyGram is a global provider of innovative money transfer and payment services and is recognized worldwide as a financial connection to friends and family. Whether online, or through a mobile device, at a kiosk or in a local store, we connect consumers any way that is convenient for them. We also provide bill payment services, issue money orders and process official checks in select markets. More information about MoneyGram International, Inc. is available at moneygram.com . 

To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/moneygram-to-present-at-the-deutsche-bank-leveraged-finance-conference-300149913.html 
Deutsche Bank MoneyGram International Leveraged Finance
